document.title: Internet (Extract)
document.citation: Simple English Wikipedia: “Internet”. Retrieved from https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internet on 20 Aug 2015.
document.body: The most used service on the Internet is the World Wide Web (which is also called the "Web"). The Web contains websites, blogs, and also wikis like Wikipedia. Webpages on the internet can be seen and read by anyone unless the page needs a password, or it is blocked).
